subject: Self Care
title: Neuroplasticity and Habit Change
description: A fast breakdown of Neuroplasticity and Habit Change for builders.

hook.text: Your brain rewires itself based on what you repeatedly do. Meditation exploits this to build calm on purpose.

buildup.text: Neuroplasticity means the brain forms new connections and weakens old ones based on repeated experience.

discovery.text: Each meditation session strengthens the neural pathways for attention, calm, and emotional regulation.

twist.text: Neuroplasticity works both ways. Scrolling and worrying also strengthen those pathways every single day.

climax.text: You are always training your brain. Meditation just lets you choose what you're training it toward.

punchline.text: Your brain becomes what you practice. Choose wisely.

quiz.question: What is neuroplasticity?
options: The brain's ability to rewire based on repeated experience
